sentence: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis has repeatedly drawn the ire of those on the left while being widely praised by those on right as he is viewed as a potential frontrunner for the GOP's presidential nomination in 2024making the incumbent a target for Democrats to attempt to unseat in the November midterm election.
author: Jason Lemon
title: Democrats' Chances of Beating Ron DeSantis in Midterm, According to Polls
